cabins.name: FS-001 VIP Cabin
cabins.description: Premium VIP porta cabin with high-quality finishes and modern amenities. Perfect for executive offices and high-end temporary accommodations. Features include spacious interior, climate control, and premium fixtures.

cabins.name: Office Porta Cabin
cabins.description: Office porta cabin with attached bathroom and pantry. Ideal for construction sites, events, and temporary office spaces. Fully equipped with electrical fittings and comfortable working environment.

cabins.name: Security Cabin (1 Person)
cabins.description: Compact security porta cabin designed for single guard duty. Weather-resistant construction with viewing windows and comfortable seating. Perfect for entrance gates and perimeter security.

cabins.name: Security Cabin (2 Person)
cabins.description: Spacious security porta cabin for two guards with comfortable seating and storage space. Includes climate control and multiple viewing angles for enhanced security monitoring.

cabins.name: Security Cabin (3 Person)
cabins.description: Large security porta cabin accommodating three guards with attached toilet facility. Ideal for 24/7 security operations with shift changes. Includes rest area and monitoring equipment space.

cabins.name: Site Office Cabin
cabins.description: Professional site office porta cabin for construction project management. Equipped with work desks, storage cabinets, and meeting area. Includes electrical setup for computers and equipment.

cabins.name: Porta Cabin Toilet Units
cabins.description: Porta cabin toilet units starting from 1 unit to customized up to 20 units. Complete with plumbing fixtures, ventilation, and lighting. Available in various configurations to suit your needs.

cabins.name: Modified Container
cabins.description: Customized shipping container converted into functional space. Versatile solution for offices, storage, or accommodation. Fully insulated with electrical installations and custom fittings.

cabins.name: Double Story Porta Cabin
cabins.description: Two-story porta cabin solution for maximum space utilization. Ideal for large projects requiring multiple rooms and facilities. Sturdy construction with staircase access and safety railings.

amenities.name: Air Conditioning
amenities.description: High-efficiency air conditioning systems to keep your porta cabin comfortable in UAE's hot climate. Energy-efficient cooling solutions suitable for all cabin sizes.

amenities.name: Electrical Setup
amenities.description: Complete electrical installations including power outlets, lighting fixtures, and circuit breakers. Compliant with UAE electrical safety standards.

amenities.name: Insulated Walls
amenities.description: Premium insulation materials for temperature control and noise reduction. Keeps interiors cool and reduces energy costs.

amenities.name: Plumbing Fixtures
amenities.description: Quality plumbing installations including toilets, sinks, and water supply systems. Water-efficient fixtures with reliable performance.

amenities.name: Security Features
amenities.description: Enhanced security with reinforced doors, window grills, and lockable systems. Secure storage solutions integrated into design.

amenities.name: Climate Control
amenities.description: Advanced HVAC systems for year-round comfort. Maintains optimal temperature and humidity levels in all weather conditions.

amenities.name: Fire Safety
amenities.description: Fire-resistant materials and safety equipment including extinguishers and smoke detectors. Compliant with UAE fire safety regulations.

amenities.name: Custom Interiors
amenities.description: Tailored interior designs to match your specific requirements. Choice of flooring, wall finishes, and ceiling options.

amenities.name: Ventilation
amenities.description: Proper ventilation systems ensuring fresh air circulation. Includes exhaust fans and air vents strategically placed.

amenities.name: Weather Resistant
amenities.description: Durable exterior materials resistant to harsh UAE weather conditions. UV-protected coatings and rust-resistant components.
